nodes.text: Urajab was a terrestrial planet in the Expansion Region with jungle terrain. In the first week of Lee Skillen's job as a supervisor at the company Ohnaka Transport Solutions in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, she accidentally sent a crate of worms to Urajab instead of its intended destination. According to Skillen, the worms became an invasive species on Urajab, and destroyed the planet's jungles, reducing them to weeds.

Sometime later, in around 34 ABY, Skillen told the tale to Julen Rakab, a resident of Black Spire Outpost who mistakenly delivered the wrong parcel to Ohnaka Transport Solutions. Urajab was pictured on a map in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by the historian Eloc Throno.
Urajab was first mentioned in the novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova and published in 2019.
